register.name: ID_AA64PFR0_EL1
register.description: Provides additional information about implemented PE features in AArch64 state...

register.name: ID_AA64ZFR0_EL1
register.description: The read-only SVE Feature ID register 0 is reserved to identify future expansion of the Scalable Vector Extension.

tcf:enumItem.description: SVE is not implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: SVE_is_not_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: SVE is implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: SVE_is_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: No RAS Extension.
tcf:enumItem.name: No_RAS_Extension

tcf:enumItem.description: Version 1 of the RAS Extension present.
tcf:enumItem.name: Version_1_of_the_RAS_Extension_present

tcf:enumItem.description: No System register interface to the GIC is supported.
tcf:enumItem.name: No_System_register_interface_to_the_GIC_is_supported

tcf:enumItem.description: System register interface to versions 3.0 and 4.0 of the GIC CPU interface is supported.
tcf:enumItem.name: System_register_interface_to_versions_3

tcf:enumItem.description: Advanced SIMD is implemented, including support for the following SISD and SIMD operations...
tcf:enumItem.name: Advanced_SIMD_is_implemented_including_support_for_the_following_SISD_and_SIMD_operations

tcf:enumItem.description: As for 0000, and also includes support for half-precision floating-point arithmetic.
tcf:enumItem.name: As_for_0000_and_also_includes_support_for_half_precision_floating_point_arithmetic

tcf:enumItem.description: Advanced SIMD is not implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: Advanced_SIMD_is_not_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Floating-point is implemented, and includes support for...
tcf:enumItem.name: Floating_point_is_implemented_and_includes_support_for

tcf:enumItem.description: As for 0000, and also includes support for half-precision floating-point arithmetic.
tcf:enumItem.name: As_for_0000_and_also_includes_support_for_half_precision_floating_point_arithmetic

tcf:enumItem.description: Floating-point is not implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: Floating_point_is_not_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: EL3 is not implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: EL3_is_not_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: EL3 can be executed in AArch64 state only.
tcf:enumItem.name: EL3_can_be_executed_in_AArch64_state_only

tcf:enumItem.description: EL3 can be executed in either AArch64 or AArch32 state.
tcf:enumItem.name: EL3_can_be_executed_in_either_AArch64_or_AArch32_state
